name: 張素薰
objective: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力。經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論，與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
schedule:
I.	The Syllabus for 4E2 English Conversation, 2013(2)
一零二學年度第二學期
Week	Topics
1	Introduction
2	Obesity
3	Dropout
4	Six Extinction
5	Death Penalty
6	The Space Race
7	The Cheating in Sports
8	Different Concepts about Beauty
9	Presentation
10	Charity Work
11	Spam
12	Cosmetic Surgery
13	Drugs
14	Censorship in Advertising
15	Genetically Modified Crops
16	Small Business
17	Presentation
18	Final report
scorePolicy:
II. Evaluation
1.	Weekly tests and Attendance. 80%
2.	Oral reports and presentations. 20%

III. The way to get into contact with the teacher
1.	Teacher’s website: http://www.cc.ntut.edu.tw/~shchang/2013/
2.	Teacher’s e-mail: shchang@ntut.edu.tw
